trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>
trans-unit.target: 指定的外观<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>属性来指定设置，如颜色、 宽度、 透明和形状的一种<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>的触笔提示</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>属性来指定用于添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>描边的绘制特性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only strokes that are added after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> undergo change show the updated attributes.
trans-unit.target: 只有之后添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>进行更新的特性的更改显示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the strokes that are already on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 笔画上已有的外观<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>不会更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.target: DrawingAttributes 类的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 DrawingAttributes 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types; however it cannot be an array of type <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equals method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否相等的以下属性是否相等:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>1> [!NOTE]&1;> Equals 方法不会检查是否相等的自定义属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制触笔的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Height property.
trans-unit.target: 以下因素影响的高度和宽度<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>呈现时，但不是高度属性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -量应用到触笔的压力时<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.target: -的值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Height property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的高度属性设置为 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP) 时，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates the height of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，该值指示触笔用于绘制的高度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Height property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 高度属性是小于<xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes according the amount of pressure applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否呈现的粗细<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>根据应用的压力量的更改。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of the stroke is uniform; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> increases when pressure is increased.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示的笔划的粗细统一;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ，则指示的呈现粗细<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>增加时增加压力。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> looks like a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>看起来像突出显示。

trans-unit.source: When the IsHighlighter property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is slightly transparent, which allows the strokes underneath to appear.
trans-unit.target: 当 IsHighlighter 属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>是稍微透明，这样，下层的笔画显示。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>呈现<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>作为突出显示; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 指定允许的最小值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MinHeight field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: MinHeight 字段用于检查值是否在允许的限制内<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 当该值来自未知源，例如不受约束的用户输入，则执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 指定允许的最小值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MinWidth field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 当该值来自未知源，例如不受约束的用户输入，则执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: The OnAttributeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAttributeChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 时发生任何<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyDataChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPropertyDataChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否相等的以下属性是否相等:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>1> [!NOTE]&1;> 相等方法不会检查是否相等的自定义属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二个<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象相等，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are not equal if the following properties are not equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Inequality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否不相等，如果以下属性是否不相等:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>1> [!NOTE]&1;> 是否不相等方法不会检查是否相等的自定义属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二个<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象是否不相等;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when property data is added or removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 添加或从中删除属性数据时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: 移除与指定<xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>关联的自定义属性

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>与要删除的自定义属性关联。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is not associated with a custom property of the object.
trans-unit.target: propertyDataId未使用的自定义属性关联对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制触笔的形状<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> ，它指定要在触笔的笔尖上执行的转换。

trans-unit.source: Use the StylusTipTransform property to rotate, skew, or scale the stylus tip.
trans-unit.target: StylusTipTransform 属性用于旋转、 倾斜或缩放触笔提示。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> ，它指定要在触笔的笔尖上执行的转换。

trans-unit.source: The matrix set to StylusTipTransform is not an invertible matrix.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 StylusTipTransform 矩阵不是可逆转的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY*> property of the matrix is not zero.
Gets or sets the width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制触笔的宽度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Width property.
trans-unit.target: 以下因素影响的高度和宽度<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>呈现时，但不是宽度属性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -量应用到触笔的压力时<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>绘制。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -的值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Width property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的宽度属性设置为 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP) 时，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制触笔的宽度<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Width property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 宽度属性是小于<xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>。
